benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/paymentMethods/refresh - Refresh account payment methods

covered: Valid Request: Multiple scenarios verify successful refresh with required and optional parameters (204).
Non-Existing Resource: 404 when account not found (TC09).
Input validation and error handling: invalid accountId (TC08), very large accountId (TC19), unsupported pluginName (TC11), malformed pluginProperty (TC12).
Authorization: missing header (TC10) and invalid/unauthorized token (TC15).
Query parameter handling: pluginName and pluginProperty across single/multiple values, plus extra query parameters (TC02-TC04, TC18).
Plugins/integration: external gateway down (TC13) and plugin service unavailable (TC25); data consistency after refresh (TC26).
Performance and resilience: timeout (TC20), degraded performance (TC14, TC29), and concurrent requests (TC23).
Regression/backwards compatibility: encoding regression (TC21) and backward compatibility with older clients (TC22).
State variation: empty database (TC27) and partially populated database (TC28).
Edge cases: many pluginProperty values (TC07) and large payloads (TC24).
Accessibility and documentation: API docs and error messages accessibility (TC30).
Operational behavior: no errors when no payment methods exist (TC06).
gaps: Explicit race-condition scenarios beyond general concurrency: Not present.
Authorization nuance: 403 forbidden scenarios not covered.
recommendations: Add rate limiting tests to verify throttling behavior under burst load.
Add caching tests to validate ETag and Cache-Control headers for refresh responses.
Add explicit race-condition tests for concurrent updates to the same account.
Add observability tests for logging/tracing of the refresh operation.
Add tests for 403 Forbidden in case of insufficient permissions (beyond 401).
